title.rendered: DONE DEAL: INVESTANCIA SIGNS PURCHASE CONTRACT!

content.rendered:
Good news 🌳🛢⬇️:

Corekees’ tree supplier (Investancia) has signed a purchase contract for the oil of 50 million (!) Trees. The ECB Group, the purchaser, is building a biofuel refinery in Asuncion, Paraguay and is guaranteed to purchase from investancia for the next 30 year.

Corekees already has a purchase contract with Investancia for the nuts of the trees; now we know for sure that our oil will be fine.

More about the deal, click here!
